title: A Tale of the fiords: a story to see and hear
brief_description: A re-edit of a Swedish film originally produced by Arne Sucksdorff. A Norwegian tale about little Ragnhild who yearns to find the legendary valley ofdreams across the fiord. She slips away from her task of milking goats on the mountainside and dreams that she has found her valley.
